# Y-IT: AAA IMAGE PROMPT LIST

## Generated by Claude Polish Persona (v1.0)

This document contains the 4K, high-fidelity prompts for every image tag in the AAA manuscript.

---

## CANONICAL STYLE GUIDES

### 1. THE POSIBOT STYLE

- **Appearance:** A compact, friendly but slightly eerie robot. Tan-colored industrial chassis. A circular glass "face" with a bright cyan digital screen behind it.
- **Digital Face:** Simple 8-bit or pixel-art expressions on the cyan screen (cheerleader eyes, blank screen, sad eyes).
- **Interactive Element:** Usually holds a physical, hand-drawn cardboard sign or a glowing neon digital sign.
- **Rendering:** 3D Pixar-style render, high-quality textures, soft depth of field.

### 2. THE CHAD STYLE

- **Appearance:** A relatable, 30-year-old office worker. Short dark hair, slightly messy. Wearing a business-casual button-down or polo shirt.
- **Vibe:** The emotional anchor. His facial expressions must be extremely expressive (Excited, Confident, Worried, Defeated).
- **Lighting:** Cinematic, dramatic key lighting (e.g., the glow from a laptop or the harsh light of a park bench at night). Realistic skin textures.

### 3. THE DATA/HERO STYLE

- **Aesthetic:** "Bloomberg Terminal" or "Data Visualizer." High contrast, neon greens/reds on dark backgrounds.
- **Charts:** Clean, minimalist, but impactful. No fluff.

---

## CHAPTER 1: THE HOOK

**[IMAGE: chad-ch1-opener-excited]**
> A cinematic 4K shot of Chad sitting in a dimly lit apartment. He is staring intensely at a glowing laptop screen. His eyes are wide, reflecting the bright neon green and gold text of a "90 Days to $10k" YouTube thumbnail. He has a look of pure, unadulterated hope and greed. Detailed skin textures, dramatic rim lighting from the monitor.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch1-01-right]**
> 3D render of PosiBot standing against a white studio background. He is wearing a tiny cheerleader pom-pom on his head. He holds a glowing neon cyan sign that reads: "MARKET GROWTH: 28% ANNUALLY!" His digital eyes are wide and excited. Soft shadows, 4K resolution.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch1-02-left]**
> 3D render of PosiBot holding a rough, hand-cut cardboard sign with "NO CODING REQUIRED!" written in thick black marker. He looks directly at the camera with a confident digital smirk. Industrial tan texture of the robot body is visible.

---

## CHAPTER 2: THE ROADMAP

**[IMAGE: chad-ch2-opener-confident]**
> Chad sitting at a clean kitchen table in broad daylight. He is wearing a crisp white polo shirt. He is leaning forward, confidently pointing at a pristine notebook where he has written "STEP 1: GET RICH" in bold Sharpie. Sharp focus, bright optimistic lighting, bokeh background.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch2-01-right]**
> PosiBot holding a neon sign: "STEP 3 IS THE FUN PART!" PosiBot has a party hat on. The neon light reflects off his tan chassis. 3D render, high detail.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch2-02-left]**
> PosiBot holding a cardboard sign: "EASY! JUST COPY & PASTE!" PosiBot’s digital eyes are blinking rapidly in a friendly way.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch2-03-right]**
> PosiBot doing a mid-air celebratory jump. He is holding a glowing sign: "PASSIVE INCOME ACTIVATED!" He looks weightless and joyful.

---

## CHAPTER 3: THE COLD START

**[IMAGE: chad-ch3-opener-worried]**
> A dramatic close-up of Chad’s face in the dark, lit only by the cold blue light of his laptop. He is biting his lower lip, looking worried. One hand is on his forehead. In the reflection of his glasses, we see a red "NEGATIVE BALANCE" warning from a bank app. Deep shadows, cinematic 4K.

**[IMAGE: hero-ch3-costs]**
> A stylized "Cost Waterfall" chart. 3D data visualization. A bar starts at $0 and moves sharply downwards in steps, colored in shades of warning red. Each step is labelled: COURSE, SOFTWARE, LEADS, API SPIKE. Dark, professional aesthetic like a trading terminal.

**[IMAGE: chart-ch3-hidden-costs]**
> A high-contrast bar chart against a black background. Bright red bars show the costs of Course ($3k), Software ($200), Leads ($500). Minimalist, lethal data aesthetic.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch3-01-right]**
> PosiBot holding a sign: "INVESTMENT IN YOUR FUTURE!" PosiBot is pointing at the sign with one tan robotic finger. His digital eyes are squinted as if he's trying to ignore a problem.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch3-02-left]**
> PosiBot holding a cardboard sign: "IT'S A NUMBERS GAME!" PosiBot looks slightly frantic, his digital eyes are swirling.

---

## CHAPTER 4: THE TRENCHES

**[IMAGE: chad-ch4-opener-stressed]**
> Chad sitting in a cluttered home office. There are crumpled papers everywhere. He is holding his head in both hands, staring at a printout of a "Tyler" and "Karen" case study. He looks aging and stressed. High contrast, gritty cinematic texture.

**[IMAGE: case-portrait-01]**
> **TYLER (The Walk-in Winner):** A realistic portrait of a fit, clean-cut 25-year-old man in a branded gym polo shirt. He is standing in a brightly lit gym lobby, shaking hands with an unseen business owner. He looks like a salesman, not a tech founder. Professional lighting, 4K.

**[IMAGE: case-portrait-02]**
> **KAREN (The Digital Grinder):** A realistic portrait of a 40-year-old woman in a professional home office. She looks exhausted, with dark circles under her eyes. She is staring at an empty email inbox. The lighting is cold and lonely. 4K detail.

**[IMAGE: case-portrait-03]**
> **JETT (The Viral Hopeful):** A portrait of a 22-year-old in a messy bedroom. He is wearing a hoodie. He is looking at a "Stripe" notification showing $0.00. Beside him, a half-eaten pizza. Gritty, realistic lighting.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch4-01-silent]**
> PosiBot sitting alone on a wooden stool in a dark corner. He is slumped slightly. Beside him, a sign with just three dots: "..." His screen face is blank. Cinematic and somber.

---

## CHAPTER 5: THE TRUTH

**[IMAGE: chad-ch5-opener-defeated]**
> Chad lying on his back on his living room floor, staring blankly at the ceiling. His laptop is closed and pushed away. The room is dark except for the moonlight through a window. Perspective from the floor looking up at his defeated face. Cinematic masterpiece lighting.

**[IMAGE: hero-ch5-truth]**
> A surreal, cinematic image of a literal avalanche of digital numbers and currency symbols ($, %, 0, 1) crashing down onto a tiny office cubicle. The office is being crushed under the weight of the pure data. 4K, dramatic scale.

**[IMAGE: chart-ch5-income-distribution]**
> A clean, high-contrast pie chart. 45% of the chart is a deep, bruised purple-red labelled "TOTAL LOSS ($0)". 32% is a slightly lighter red labelled "NEGATIVE ROI". Only a tiny 2% sliver at the top glows bright cyan, labelled "THE 2% (WINNERS)".

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch5-01-right]**
> PosiBot holding a sign: "DATA DON'T APPLY TO PASSION!" PosiBot is wearing a headband that says "GO!" but his chassis looks rusty and worn out in this light.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch5-02-left]**
> PosiBot holding a cardboard sign: "SELL THE FUTURE!" The sign is slightly torn. PosiBot’s digital eyes are flickering.

---

## CHAPTER 6: THE VERDICT

**[IMAGE: chad-ch6-opener-contemplating]**
> Chad sitting on a park bench at twilight. He is looking at two things in his hands: his wedding ring on his finger and his smartphone. He is in a moment of deep, quiet realization. Soft, empathetic lighting.

**[IMAGE: hero-ch6-verdict]**
> A high-resolution photo of actual brass scales of justice in a dark, mahogany-panelled room. One side has a glowing AI logo. The other side has a massive heap of burning $100 bills. The fire is casting dramatic orange light on the scales.

**[IMAGE: diagram-ch6-three-questions]**
> A clean, infographic-style flowchart on a dark gray background. Cyan and white lines. It poses three questions with "YES/NO" paths. The "NO" paths are thick and lead to a bright green icon of a person sleeping. The "YES" paths are thin, jagged, and lead to a red icon of a person running up a mountain.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch6-01-quiet]**
> PosiBot standing quietly in the rain. Water droplets are on his tan chassis. He has no sign. He is simply looking down at his own robotic hands.

---

## CHAPTER 7: THE PIVOT

**[IMAGE: chad-ch7-opener-relieved]**
> Close up of Chad’s face. He is drinking a hot cup of coffee and looking out a window at a sunrise. He looks like a weight has been lifted from his shoulders. He is smiling slightly for the first time in 5 chapters.

**[IMAGE: hero-ch7-pivot]**
> A wide-angle cinematic shot of a fork in a digital highway. One road is dark, filled with traffic jams, and has a sign "AAA AGENCY (90% CHANCE OF ACCIDENT)". The other road is clear, sunlit, and has a sign "FREELANCE AUTOMATION".

**[IMAGE: chart-ch7-comparison-table]**
> A clean, high-contrast comparison table. "AAA" vs "McDonalds" vs "Freelancing". The "McDonalds" row has a bright green "100% SUCCESS RATE" tag. The aesthetic is clean and modern, like a SaaS pricing page.

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch7-01-ignored]**
> Chad is walking down a street, looking purposeful. PosiBot is floating slightly behind him, trying to shove a cardboard sign into his view. Chad is holding up a hand, effectively pushing PosiBot away without looking back.

---

## CHAPTER 8: THE EXIT RAMP

**[IMAGE: chad-ch8-opener-hopeful]**
> Chad standing in front of a modern glass office building. He is wearing a simple polo shirt and carrying a laptop bag. He looks grounded, realistic, and prepared. He is stepping forward with intention.

**[IMAGE: hero-ch8-exit]**
> A cinematic shot from a dark tunnel looking out into a bright, white, sunlit exit. The silhouette of a person (Chad) is stepping through the doorway.

**[IMAGE: diagram-ch8-exit-criteria]**
> A high-contrast graphic of a hand signing a document. The document clearly shows the words "EXIT CRITERIA: I WILL QUIT AT $________". It looks like a legally binding contract with oneself.

**[IMAGE: diagram-ch8-assessment-tool]**
> A 3D checklist floating in a dark digital space. The boxes for "CAPITAL", "TIME", and "SKILLS" are being checked by a glowing cyan cursor. The final line at the bottom glows bright white: "PROBABILITY OF SUCCESS: 2%".

**[IMAGE: posibot-ch8-01-sincere]**
> A close-up of PosiBot’s face. His cyan screen has simple, sincere happy eyes (**^__^**). He is waving one robotic hand. No sign. He looks genuinely friendly for the first time. 4K, detailed reflections.

---
*End of Prompt List*
